reviewText: I didn't know much about Bill Tapia and this documentary helped me learn more about him. This film was concentrated in Bill's later life - after his wife passed away. Although this film did have some information on earlier history, I would have liked to learn about and see more from his younger days. I would recommend this film to those wanting to know more about Bill Tapia or those learning about the legendary ukulele players.
On top of being an excellent musician, the man was a charismatic personality that can only be appreciated in video.
An amazing glimpse at a recent part of the amazing Bill Tapia's life.  Whether you're a Tapia fan or not, you'll be moved by this story.
